website_summaries.verdict: A spacious tackle box at a budget price. Though it has a few issues, its convenient features and reasonable price make it a good deal.
pros: A spacious box (20" x 10.5" x 10.4") with up to 37 separate compartments for various-sized equipment
Convenient fold-out tier system saves space
About half the price of costlier models
cons: The plastic has a weak feel, and the hinge that attaches the cover tends to be misaligned

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy and wobbly when you open it. Now recently the pin holding the top cover that opens and closes came off and lost. Too light for a boat abchor I will be looking for another box more durably built.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: The box is fine, the top shelf however is loose
customer_reviews.text: The box is fine, the top shelf however is loose, and things are constantly being bounced around or even bounced out of their cubbies even on just rough road drives. it was a simple fix, i put bigger items up there and i put some cardboard over it to stop it from exploding when i opened it. great box for the price, if the roads in my area were better i probably wouldn't have had the problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: noesanity

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but will do the job for a casual fisher.
customer_reviews.text: There are no screws that hold the hinges onto the drawers. It appears everything inside the toolbox is snap on. If u unfold the trays eith care, the box is sturdy once you get the trays aligned with the resting spot. I can see the box holding up for occasional light duty use. Dont buy this if you fish frequently and are looking for something long lasting that can take a beating. I should have read the reviews before buying, but i rarely fish and i can live with handling with care.
customer_reviews.author: LAKERCHUY

customer_reviews.title: Used as a seat
customer_reviews.text: My plussino collapsible rod and reel fits inside perfectly. If you doubt the strength of this box, I'm 185 lbs + my gear on, and I ended up using this box as a seat in the boat for several hours. If you're in a full charter boat, on a long 3 hour trip to Catalina Island and back, you'll be the envy of everyone who has to stand on their feet or sit on the deck for 3 hours. Just be careful when shifting your weight.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ripalda

customer_reviews.title: At first I would have given this box a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I would have given this box a 5 star rating, but I've only been using it for a couple months and the shelves are already sagging and uneven when opened
customer_reviews.author: American Ninja Nerdier

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store my sewing things, u know: needles, threads, buttons and what not, the size is right but the pull out trays are super flimsy, hope they are able to hold all my stuff. When u open the box they don't automatically come up, u have to manually pull them out. bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amallie

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done
customer_reviews.text: I am an electrical engineering student and I use this to neatly store all my bits and pieces. Take this review with a grain of salt because I am not using the product as intended. It's good and spacious but the plastic is flimsy as can be. I'm honestly surprised i haven't broken it yet. It's also much larger than expected so watch out for that, but i guess it says XL on the product so I should have known. Whenever opening it make sure you are gentle and pick up the plastic trays from the middle, otherwise they'll fall unevenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect large sized Tackle box
customer_reviews.text: I liked this tackle box because not only does it have plenty of fishing tackle storage space but the bottom portion of this box is large enough to carry many accessories like a fillet knife, weighing scales, a stringer, fishing pliers, a flashlight, fish attractor, a scaling tool, etc... and this tackle box is well built ! ...reinforced from the interior to not bend or be flimsy when weighted with lots of tackle. Priced right to make it a great value. Thanks Amazon for the prompt shipping and good price !
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Evans

customer_reviews.title: carries a lot more stuff
customer_reviews.text: nice size, ample tray slots. carries a lot more stuff
customer_reviews.author: Roland S.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to organize my dremmel tool and attachments. Nice well built box, if it holds up as a toolbox i have no doubt it would work great as the tackle box it's made to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice size box. It seems a little flimsy, although we have not had any issues with it yet. I suspect within a years time, I will need another one.
customer_reviews.author: JustAMan

customer_reviews.title: This is just what we needed for all of our ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed for all of our loose odds and ends--random tools, pieces from Ikea, hooks, sandpaper sheets, etc. The top feels a little flimsy when it's folded out (especially when full of stuff), but so far no problems. Just use two hands when expanding the trays.
customer_reviews.author: snowbunny22

customer_reviews.title: Big and Sturdy Tackle Box!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this tackle box! Much larger than I expected. Lots of sizes of compartments. And I like the color too. I like that it is all plastic since my other boxes always end up rusty.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable. Handle that popped off and snapped right back in to place. Good sturdy material. Lots of tray pockets. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent produc
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, resistant box, good measure, is recommended. I'm glad to have it, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Muselli

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several fully stocked boxes and unsure if description changed or I added wrong one to cart but it is not as pictured. Arrived as empty box.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older Flambeau I had. It's not as heavily made as my previous one but, I don't expect any premature failure.
customer_reviews.author: SuperGlide

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my smaller craft items. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: -E*

customer_reviews.title: FLambeau Tackle XL
customer_reviews.text: Fine product. Great price and service! Using for quilting supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome box and I got it for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome box and I got it for a great price. I am using it for my painting supplies and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda N.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This box is flimsy. I purchased it to use as a first aid box so it works OK. If I were going to use it for fishing I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Flambeau's A Go
customer_reviews.text: Got a little bendy, but held quite a bit of gear. May need to Tetris your items so it closes, but otherwise a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte O.

customer_reviews.title: This box has a major flaw. The cover has ...
customer_reviews.text: This box has a major flaw. The cover has some really bogus hinges and almost every time it's opened the cover comes off. It's plastic and just snaps into place. Obviously nobody who "designed" this used it in the real world and if they had, they be back to the drawing board. Extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: penpal

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My tackle box arrived quickly. I use it as an electrical parts box for radio control parts and supplies. It's perfect size for a field box
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a first aid storage kit
customer_reviews.text: I use this tackle box as a medical supply kit. The dividers work great for storing band-aids an gauze pads. Also it is super fast to locate what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Using it to carry electronic components, works much better than plastic cases
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's what I expected, needs weight in the bottom to function well.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Boy

customer_reviews.title: Nice large sewing kit box
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a sewing kit box. It's about 30% larger than what fabric stores sell.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Windrum

customer_reviews.title: The box is only ok. I have used it ...
customer_reviews.text: The box is only ok. I have used it 4 times and twice I have had to make sure the plastic hinge stays in place, It's just too flimsy for me. New update. The lid keeps falling off. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted it and when he got it, he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cavett

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This tackle box is worthless wasted money on it broke the first time using it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Christine Espada

customer_reviews.title: Worst shipping ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst shipping ever. It came in a box 3x bigger than the tackle box with a small amount of packing paper. The box looked like it had been jumped on, thrown and ran over. It had been retaped by UPS. The actual tackle box has a light colored stress mark on it, probably from being thrown around in the box. This is a gift for my husband, but to me it seems a little cheap. When I pull the trays out, they slide up unevenly and just have a cheap feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Martiniolive

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of the tackle box pretty large and I have lots of empty compartments
customer_reviews.text: Tons of storage and adjustable dividers. A lot bigger in person than in the picture. Bottom of the tackle box pretty large and I have lots of empty compartments. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Williams

customer_reviews.title: Paint box
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I don't use it for fishing. I have a paint set with 36 tubes of acrylic latex paint and needed something to keep this and brushes in that was more easily accessible. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: ... mess of a lab area (DIY E-Juice) into one nice, mostly organized box
customer_reviews.text: Turned my whole mess of a lab area (DIY E-Juice) into one nice, mostly organized box. It's everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Durban

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to miss return window
customer_reviews.text: Item lid separates from bottom after second use. Since item is not used daily, it is easy to miss return window.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Worthy

customer_reviews.title: BIG BOX
customer_reviews.text: Nice tackle box, large size has plenty of room for all your tackle, well spaced tray dividers and large bottom fits spools of line ,small utility boxes (Well Made BIG TACKLE BOX)
customer_reviews.author: Janet D. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Expedition-Ready
customer_reviews.text: Good size tackle box, and decently made (in the USA!). You may want to consider pairing this up with a smaller unit for shorter trips, though. And be sure to cut a rigid piece of cardboard to fit over the top tray -- if you don't, the gap between the tray and lid could result in auto-rearrangement of your go-to gear at the worst possible moment
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.  Poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: Too flimsy and poorly made. When trays are extended they don't even hit the thin bottom support so the trays are very unstable. I returned it and bought a Plano.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pflueger

customer_reviews.title: Make up case
customer_reviews.text: I tride in place of my Kapoodle i had for years it borke this tackle box is amazing it has many compatments so you can organize you items
customer_reviews.author: juju

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: All of the photos of this tackle box show it filled with tackle. When I got the box it was empty. I didn't notice a disclaimer explaining it came empty. I was pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hoy

customer_reviews.title: You will find a better tackle box for less money at your local Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Cheap!!! You will find a better tackle box for less money at your local Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

product_meta.title: Flambeau Tackle XL 3-Tray Tackle Box, Black/Dark Gray
product_meta.description: 3 tray tackle box Xlarge ; classic tray Series features drawtite latch, tip-guard tray supports and all weather, worm proof materials. The tongue-and groove construction between lid and base yields water resistant design and precision fit. This oversized extra-large 3-tray features up to 37 compartments and two clear lid covers on top tray that keep small items from moving around inside box. The largest 3-tray box available. ; tray boxes (3% Excise Tax) ; Flambeau products; size 20 x 10. 25 x 10. 375 up to 37 compartments. Drawtite latch, tip-guard tray supports and all weather, worm-proof materials. Tongue-and-groove construction between lid and base yields water-resistant design and precision fit. Each includes removable dividers for enhanced storage capabilities. Varied tray depth for greater capacity options.
feature_bullets: Manufactured in the country of China
Made of the highest quality material
Features a Drawtite latch, Tip-Guard try supports and all-weather, worm-proof materials
Tongue-and-groove construction between lid and base yields water-resistant design and precision fit
Includes removable dividers for enhanced storage capabilites
Varied try depth for greater capacity options
